files.content:
#!/bin/bash

# <bitbar.title>Screenshotter</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.1</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>moshed</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>moshed</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Takes Screenshots from menu bar with confugrable delay (by holding alt key when tapping an option), screenshot modes (fullscreen, window, crop or touchbar), alerts and direct imgur upload </bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>http://i.imgur.com/6wt8cbN.png</bitbar.image>
# <bitbar.dependencies>https://github.com/vjeantet/alerter/releases</bitbar.dependencies>

function encode_image {
    icon=""
}

function screenshot () {
    screencapture "$1" "$(cat "${bitbar_directory}/setup/com.screenshotter.setup")$(date +'%Y.%m.%d-%H.%M.%S').png"
}

function post_screenshot {
    screenshot_path=$(find "$screenshot_folder" -mindepth 1 | sort -r | grep -v .DS_Store | head -n 1)
    osascript -e "tell application \"Finder\" to set the clipboard to (POSIX file \"$screenshot_path\")"
    user_response_1=$(alerter -title "Screenshotter" -sender "com.apple.automator.Screenshotter" -message "Screenshot Taken" -actions "Upload to Imgur,Open Location,Edit" -dropdownLabel Actions -timeout 5 -contentImage "$screenshot_path")
    if [ "$user_response_1" == "Upload to Imgur" ]
    then
        imgur_uploader "$screenshot_path"
        user_response_2=$(alerter -title "Screenshotter" -subtitle "Succesfully Uploaded" -message "Link copied to clipboard" -actions "Open Link" -timeout 5 -sender "com.apple.automator.imgur" -contentImage "$screenshot_path")
        if [ "$user_response_2" == "Open Link" ]
        then
            open "$(pbpaste)"
        fi
    elif [ "$user_response_1" == "Open Location" ]
    then
        open -R "$screenshot_path"
    elif [ "$user_response_1" == "Edit" ]
    then
        open "$screenshot_path"
        sleep .5
        osascript "${HOME}/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~ScriptEditor2/Documents/Markup Toolbar Show.scpt"
    fi
}

function delay {
    delay_time=$(alerter -title "Screenshotter" -sender "com.apple.automator.Screenshotter" -message "Set delay" -actions 1s,2s,5s,10s,20s,30s,60s -dropdownLabel Set -timeout 10 | sed 's/[^0-9]//g')
    alerter -title "Screenshotter" -sender "com.apple.automator.Screenshotter" -message "Screenshotting in $delay_time seconds" -timeout 1
    for x in $(seq "$delay_time")
    do
        echo "$x" >/dev/null
        afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Morse.aiff
        seleep 1
    done
}

bitbar_directory=${0%/*}
encode_image

if [ ! -f "${bitbar_directory}/setup/com.screenshotter.setup" ]
then
    mkdir "${bitbar_directory}/setup"
    if [ "$(alerter -title "Screenshotter" -sender "com.apple.automator.Screenshotter" -message "Set Screenshot path" -actions "Set Path" -timeout 7)" == "Set Path" ]
    then
        screenshot_folder=$(osascript -e "POSIX path of (choose folder)")
    else
        exit
    fi
    echo "$screenshot_folder" >"${bitbar_directory}/setup/com.screenshotter.setup"
    chflags hidden "${bitbar_directory}/setup"
else
    screenshot_folder=$(cat "${bitbar_directory}/setup/com.screenshotter.setup")
fi

if [ "$1" == "fullscreen" ]
then
    if [ "$2" == "delay" ]
    then
        delay
    fi
    screenshot
    post_screenshot
elif [ "$1" == "crop" ]
then
    if [ "$2" == "delay" ]
    then
        delay
    fi
    screenshot -s
    post_screenshot
elif [ "$1" == "window" ]
then
    if [ "$2" == "delay" ]
    then
        delay
    fi
    screenshot -w
    post_screenshot
elif [ "$1" == "touchbar" ]
then
    if [ "$2" == "delay" ]
    then
        delay
    fi
    screenshot -b
    post_screenshot
elif [ "$1" == "keyboard" ]
then
    user_response_3=$(alerter -title "Screenshotter" -sender "com.apple.automator.Screenshotter" -message "Choose Screenshot Mode" -actions Fullscreen,Window,Crop,Touchbar -dropdownLabel "Mode" -timeout 5 | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' )
    "${HOME}/Resources/BitBar/Screenshotter.1d.sh" "$user_response_3"
fi

echo " | templateImage=$icon"
echo "---"
echo "Fullscreen | bash='$0' param1=fullscreen terminal=false"
echo "Fullscreen Delay | bash='$0' param1=fullscreen param2=delay terminal=false alternate=true"
echo "Window | bash='$0' param1=window terminal=false"
echo "Window Delay| bash='$0' param1=window terminal=false param2=delay alternate=true"
echo "Crop | bash='$0' param1=crop terminal=false"
echo "Crop Delay| bash='$0' param1=crop terminal=false param2=delay alternate=true"
echo "Touchbar | bash='$0' param1=touchbar terminal=false"
echo "Touchbar Delay | bash='$0' param1=touchbar terminal=false param2=delay alternate=true"

plugin.title: Screenshotter
plugin.author: moshed
plugin.desc: Takes Screenshots from menu bar with confugrable delay (by holding alt key when tapping an option), screenshot modes (fullscreen, window, crop or touchbar), alerts and direct imgur upload
